verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came again unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man שִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> sim set פָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha thy face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons עַמּ֑וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon; of Ammon וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> ve-hin-na-Ve and prophesy עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem. against

וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta And say לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei to the sons עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon, of Ammon שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U Hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- the word אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai of the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; GOD כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֡ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD יַעַן֩ <S%H3282><s%> ya-'An Because אָמְרֵ֨ךְ <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Rech Because thou saidst הֶאָ֜ח <S%H1889><s%> he-'Ach Aha אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- and against מִקְדָּשִׁ֣י <S%H4720><s%> mik-da-Shi against my sanctuary כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> chi- when נִחָ֗ל <S%H2490><s%> ni-Chal, when it was profaned וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and against אַדְמַ֤ת <S%H127><s%> 'ad-Mat and against the land יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki when נָשַׁ֔מָּה <S%H8074><s%> na-Sham-mah, when it was desolate וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and against בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit and against the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki when הָלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> ha-le-Chu when they went בַּגּוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1473><s%> bag-go-Lah. into captivity

לָכֵ֡ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen therefore הִנְנִי֩ <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni I am going נֹתְנָ֨ךְ <S%H5414><s%> no-te-Nach Behold therefore I will deliver לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> liv-nei- thee to the men קֶ֜דֶם <S%H6924><s%> Ke-dem of the east לְמֽוֹרָשָׁ֗ה <S%H4181><s%> le-mo-ra-Shah, for a possession וְיִשְּׁב֤וּ <S%H3427><s%> ve-yish-she-Vu and they shall set טִירֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H2918><s%> ti-ro-tei-Hem their palaces בָּ֔ךְ Bach, וְנָ֥תְנוּ <S%H5414><s%> ve-Na-te-nu in thee and make בָ֖ךְ vach מִשְׁכְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H4908><s%> mish-ke-nei-Hem; their dwellings הֵ֚מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they יֹאכְל֣וּ <S%H398><s%> yo-che-Lu in thee they shall eat פִרְיֵ֔ךְ <S%H6529><s%> fir-Yech, thy fruit וְהֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem-mah like יִשְׁתּ֥וּ <S%H8354><s%> yish-Tu and they shall drink חֲלָבֵֽךְ׃ <S%H2461><s%> cha-la-Vech. thy milk

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רַבָּה֙ <S%H7237><s%> rab-Bah Rabbah לִנְוֵ֣ה <S%H5116><s%> lin-Veh a stable גְמַלִּ֔ים <S%H1581><s%> ge-mal-Lim, for camels וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei and the sons עַמּ֖וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon of Ammon לְמִרְבַּץ־ <S%H4769><s%> le-mir-batz- a couchingplace צֹ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> Tzon; for flocks וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD ס sa-Mek

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki For כֹ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> choh thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an Because מַחְאֲךָ֣ <S%H4222><s%> mach-'a-Cha Because thou hast clapped יָ֔ד <S%H3027><s%> Yad, [thine] hands וְרַקְעֲךָ֖ <S%H7554><s%> ve-rak-'a-Cha and stamped בְּרָ֑גֶל <S%H7272><s%> be-Ra-gel; with the feet וַתִּשְׂמַ֤ח <S%H8055><s%> vat-tis-Mach and rejoiced בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all שָֽׁאטְךָ֙ <S%H7589><s%> sha-te-Cha with all thy despite בְּנֶ֔פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> be-Ne-fesh, in heart אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against אַדְמַ֖ת <S%H127><s%> 'ad-Mat against the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

לָכֵ֡ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen therefore הִנְנִי֩ <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold נָטִ֨יתִי <S%H5186><s%> na-Ti-ti Behold therefore I will stretch out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָדִ֜י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di mine hand עָלֶ֗יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha, against וּנְתַתִּ֤יךָ־ <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-tat-Ti-cha- upon thee and will deliver; לְבַג le-vag כלְבַז֙ <S%H897><s%> le-Vaz spoil קלַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> lag-go-Yim, to the heathen וְהִכְרַתִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H3772><s%> ve-hich-rat-Ti-cha and I will cut thee off מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim, from the people וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֖יךָ <S%H6><s%> ve-ha-'a-vad-Ti-cha and I will cause thee to perish מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָאֲרָצ֑וֹת <S%H776><s%> ha-'a-ra-Tzot; out of the countries אַשְׁמִ֣ידְךָ֔ <S%H8045><s%> 'ash-Mi-de-cha, I will destroy וְיָדַעְתָּ֖ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-da'-Ta thee and thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; GOD יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an, Because אֲמֹ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mor do say מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av that Moab וְשֵׂעִ֔יר <S%H8165><s%> ve-se-'Ir, and Seir הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold כְּכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> ke-chal- all הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim [is] like unto all the heathen בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit Behold the house יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

לָכֵן֩ <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen therefore הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni I am going פֹתֵ֜חַ <S%H6605><s%> fo-Te-ach Therefore behold I will open אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כֶּ֤תֶף <S%H3802><s%> Ke-tef the side מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av of Moab מֵהֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> me-He-'a-Rim, from the cities מֵֽעָרָ֖יו <S%H5892><s%> me-'a-Rav from his cities מִקָּצֵ֑הוּ <S%H7097><s%> mik-ka-Tze-hu; [which are] on his frontiers צְבִ֗י <S%H6643><s%> tze-Vi, the glory אֶ֚רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz of the country בֵּ֣ית beit הַיְשִׁימֹ֔ת <S%H1020><s%> hay-shi-Mot, Bethjeshimoth בַּ֥עַל Ba-'al מְע֖וֹן <S%H1186><s%> me-'on Baalmeon; וְקִרְיָתְמָה ve-kir-ya-te-mah כוְקִרְיָתָֽיְמָה׃ <S%H7156><s%> ve-kir-ya-Ta-ye-mah. Kiriathaim ק

לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> liv-nei- Unto the men קֶ֙דֶם֙ <S%H6924><s%> ke-dem of the east עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- along בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei to the sons עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon, of Ammon וּנְתַתִּ֖יהָ <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-tat-Ti-ha and will give לְמֽוֹרָשָׁ֑ה <S%H4181><s%> le-mo-ra-Shah; them in possession לְמַ֛עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an so לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not תִזָּכֵ֥ר <S%H2142><s%> tiz-za-Cher may not be remembered בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- the sons עַמּ֖וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon of Ammon בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim. among the nations

וּבְמוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> u-ve-mo-'Av upon Moab אֶעֱשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> 'e-'e-Seh And I will execute שְׁפָטִ֑ים <S%H8201><s%> she-fa-Tim; judgments וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-de-'U and they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an Because עֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> a-Sot hath dealt אֱד֛וֹם <S%H123><s%> e-Dom Because that Edom בִּנְקֹ֥ם <S%H5358><s%> bin-Kom by taking נָקָ֖ם <S%H5359><s%> na-Kam vengeance לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit against the house יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah וַיֶּאְשְׁמ֥וּ <S%H816><s%> vai-ye'-she-Mu and hath greatly אָשׁ֖וֹם <S%H816><s%> a-Shom offended וְנִקְּמ֥וּ <S%H5358><s%> ve-nik-ke-Mu and revenged בָהֶֽם׃ va-Hem.

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD וְנָטִ֤תִי <S%H5186><s%> ve-na-Ti-ti I will also stretch out יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di mine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> e-Dom, upon Edom וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <S%H3772><s%> ve-hich-rat-Ti and will cut off מִמֶּ֖נָּה <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nah at אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam man וּבְהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> u-ve-he-Mah; and beast וּנְתַתִּ֤יהָ <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-tat-Ti-ha from it and I will make חָרְבָּה֙ <S%H2723><s%> cha-re-Bah it desolate מִתֵּימָ֔ן <S%H8487><s%> mit-tei-Man, from Teman וּדְדָ֖נֶה <S%H1719><s%> u-de-Da-neh and they of Dedan בַּחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ba-Che-rev by the sword יִפֹּֽלוּ׃ <S%H5307><s%> yip-Po-lu. shall fall

וְנָתַתִּ֨י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will lay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נִקְמָתִ֜י <S%H5360><s%> nik-ma-Ti my vengeance בֶּאֱד֗וֹם <S%H123><s%> be-'e-Dom, upon Edom בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad by the hand עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi of my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Israel וְעָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Su and they shall do בֶאֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> ve-'e-Dom, in Edom כְּאַפִּ֖י <S%H639><s%> ke-'ap-Pi according to mine anger וְכַחֲמָתִ֑י <S%H2534><s%> ve-cha-cha-ma-Ti; and according to my fury וְיָֽדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-de-'U and they shall know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נִקְמָתִ֔י <S%H5360><s%> nik-ma-Ti, my vengeance נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. GOD פ Peh

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD יַ֛עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an Because עֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> a-Sot have dealt פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim Because the Philistines בִּנְקָמָ֑ה <S%H5360><s%> bin-ka-Mah; by revenge וַיִּנָּקְמ֤וּ <S%H5358><s%> vai-yin-na-ke-Mu and have taken נָקָם֙ <S%H5359><s%> na-Kam vengeance בִּשְׁאָ֣ט <S%H7589><s%> bish-'At with a despiteful בְּנֶ֔פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> be-Ne-fesh, heart לְמַשְׁחִ֖ית <S%H4889><s%> le-mash-Chit to destroy אֵיבַ֥ת <S%H342><s%> 'ei-Vat hatred עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. [it] for the old

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold נוֹטֶ֤ה <S%H5186><s%> no-Teh Behold I will stretch out יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di mine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim, upon the Philistines וְהִכְרַתִּ֖י <S%H3772><s%> ve-hich-rat-Ti and I will cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כְּרֵתִ֑ים <S%H3774><s%> ke-re-Tim; the Cherethims וְהַ֣אֲבַדְתִּ֔י <S%H6><s%> ve-Ha-'a-vad-Ti, and destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <S%H7611><s%> she-'e-Rit the remnant ח֥וֹף <S%H2348><s%> Chof coast הַיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam. of the sea

וְעָשִׂ֤יתִי <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ti And I will execute בָם֙ vam נְקָמ֣וֹת <S%H5360><s%> ne-ka-Mot vengeance גְּדֹל֔וֹת <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lot, great בְּתוֹכְח֖וֹת <S%H8433><s%> be-toch-Chot rebukes חֵמָ֑ה <S%H2534><s%> che-Mah; upon them with furious וְיָֽדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-de-'U and they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, that I [am] the LORD בְּתִתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> be-tit-Ti when I shall lay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נִקְמָתִ֖י <S%H5360><s%> nik-ma-Ti my vengeance בָּֽם׃ Bam. ס sa-Mek
